name: Campfire (sinusinu)
description:
Campfire is a game about finding a house in a forest.

You are lost in a forest, and you must find a house to rest.

Monsters are waiting in the dark, but you have a campfire which repels all the monsters away.

You have an axe, and forest is full of trees. Putting tree log into the campfire will extend its light.

You can take only one item at a time, and with that, you must find a house to rest while cutting trees, putting logs into campfire, and avoiding monsters.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019

Used Assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-animated-campfire

https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-grass-textures-20-pack

and a bunch of assets from Humble Bundle RPG Game Dev Bundle
